sentences.en: A career in law is becoming increasingly attractive to young people.
sentences.cn: 法律行业对年轻人的吸引力越来越大。

sentences.en: Arran became increasingly estranged from the mainstream of Hollywood.
sentences.cn: 阿伦变得越来越脱离好莱坞的主流了。

sentences.en: But Artaud was increasingly dissatisfied with film as a medium.
sentences.cn: 但是阿尔托对电影这种表现方式越来越不满。

sentences.en: Farmers are increasingly losing touch with their instinct for managing the land.
sentences.cn: 农民正在逐渐丢失经营土地的本领。

sentences.en: I find myself growing increasingly angry at the absurdity of the situation.
sentences.cn: 对如此荒谬可笑的情况我感到越来越生气。

sentences.en: Increasingly, corporate clients are seeking to outsource the management of their facilities.
sentences.cn: 越来越多的公司客户寻求将设施的管理外包出去。

sentences.en: Increasingly, more wine-makers are taking up the challenge of growing Pinot Noir.
sentences.cn: 越来越多的酿酒商开始接受种植黑皮诺葡萄的挑战。

sentences.en: Increasingly, young people distrust all forms of government.
sentences.cn: 年轻人越来越不相信任何形式的政府。

sentences.en: Jackson said her boss became increasingly depressed and reverted to smoking heavily.
sentences.cn: 杰克逊说她的老板情绪越来越低落，又开始拼命抽烟了。

sentences.en: Marketing techniques are becoming increasingly sophisticated.
sentences.cn: 市场营销技巧越来越巧妙。

sentences.en: Scientists are becoming increasingly unsure of the validity of this technique.
sentences.cn: 科学家们越来越拿不准这一技术是否正当合法。

sentences.en: She was finding it increasingly difficult to get about.
sentences.cn: 她发现出去走动越来越困难了。

sentences.en: The baron became increasingly heated over the hypocrisy of it all.
sentences.cn: 男爵对整件事的虚伪感到越来越生气。

sentences.en: The big clubs are becoming increasingly impatient at the rate of progress.
sentences.cn: 大牌俱乐部对缓慢的进展越来越不耐烦了。

sentences.en: The commercial world is now being increasingly computerized.
sentences.cn: 商业界目前正在日益计算机化。

sentences.en: The rest of the arts scene looks increasingly turgid by comparison.
sentences.cn: 比较而言，艺术界的其他领域看起来越发索然无味。

sentences.en: This factor will come increasingly to the fore as election day nears.
sentences.cn: 随着选举日的临近，这一因素将愈发重要。

sentences.en: We became increasingly fed up with his increasingly unfunny and unintelligent comments.
sentences.cn: 我们越来越反感他益发无趣又缺乏见地的言论。

trans.tran_cn: 不断增加地，越来越多地
trans.tran_en: more and more all the time
